project.description: Metadata Management and Data Governance Platform over Hadoop
project.name: metaspace

requireMavenVersion.message: ** MAVEN VERSION ERROR ** Maven 3.5.0 or above is required. See https://maven.apache.org/install.html

requireJavaVersion.message: ** JAVA VERSION ERROR ** Java 8 (Update 151) or above is required.
** JAVA VERSION WARNING ** Java 9 and above has not been tested with Atlas.
